'''Flowers Resplendent on the Sun-Scorched Sojourn''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Footprints of the Traveler (CN)|Footprints of the Traveler]]''. It is currently available on the Chinese release of ''Footprints of the Traveler'' only.

It was added in the album on August 16, 2024, on QQ Music.
